snippet: The Italian Coast Guard rescued 970 migrants Wednesday after smugglers put their cargo ship on automatic pilot, heading straight for a crash into the Italian coast, and abandoned the command.
abstract: Italian Coast Guard rescues 970 migrants who were abandoned by smugglers by tracing satellite phone call from passenger asking for help; Moldavan-flagged cargo ship Blue Sky M was found to be on automatic pilot directed toward coast; migrants, mostly Syrians, arrive safely in Gallipoli located in southeastern Puglia region of Italy.
lead_paragraph: The Italian Coast Guard rescued 970 migrants Wednesday after smugglers put their cargo ship on automatic pilot, heading straight for a crash into the Italian coast, and abandoned the command.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
